title: PlayStation State of Play vs. the Game Awards - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.06.19
description:
Try Hims today by starting out with a FREE online visit by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

Go to http://tipsyelves.com/games now to get 20% off your entire order!

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Imran and Greg (and Tim!) debate what will be at the newly announced PlayStation State of Play and what will be at the Game Awards.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:36 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:18 - PlayStation State of Play
00:09:17 - “Let's put our tin foil hats on…” - Frankfurtter
00:17:55 - “Do you think we'll hear anything about new studio acquisitions?” - Emo Johnny 79
00:21:46 - Riot publishing games and coming to Game Awards
00:26:57 - “What video game companies would you want to work together to make an amazing gaming experience?” - Robby Rob
00:30:21 - Dr Disrespect and Skybound sign development deal
00:37:32 - Death Stranding Update Detailed
00:40:40 - Starbreeze Ain’t Dead
00:44:55 - Out today
00:49:25 -  Hims
00:50:53 - Tipsy Elves
00:52:07 - Manscaped
 Reader mail   -
00:53:17 - “How can developers treat tie in content better than they currently are?” - The Merry Nano Biologist
01:01:02 - Squad Up: Robby Rob - PC and Xbox - Xyameax
01:02:40 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg & Tim
TUESDAY: Greg & Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg & Whitta
THURSDAY: Imran & Tim
FRIDAY: Imran & Snowbike Mike
